text.paragraph: Sattādhikaraṇavhayāti sattādhikaraṇasamathanāmakā. Taṃ atthavinicchayaṃ tādisaṃyeva yasmā vidū vadantīti attho. Yathā niṭṭhitāti sambandho. Sabbāsavapahanti sabbāsavavighātakaṃ arahattamaggaṃ. Passantu nibbutinti maggañāṇena nibbānaṃ sacchikarontu, pappontūti vā pāṭho. Tattha nibbutinti khandhaparinibbānaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
